title: Digital Technologies Fueling Data Center Growth: The Path to Sustainability
description: Data centers serve as the silent engines driving the digital revolution in a time when digital technologies permeate every part of our existence. However, the increasing energy needs imposed on these data hubs present a serious threat to sustainability and carbon neutrality as the globe moves closer to Industry 4.0.  Understanding data centers Data centers […]

title: Ubisoft’s Shooter XDefiant Postponed Amid Network and Development Challenges
description: The release of the Ubisoft project, XFiend, a free-to-play shooting game led by ex-CoD’s Senior Executive Mark Rubin, is postponed once again. The date for the game’s release, which was initially listed for the end of March, has been postponed indefinitely in connection with a number of unresolved network performance problems. Through social media, the […]

title: Telegram rolls out TON-based revenue sharing system
description: The Telegram messenger has unveiled a new revenue sharing system that allows channels’ owners to get 50% of revenue from ads displayed on their channels. In a blog post on Mar. 31, Telegram announced the launch of a new revenue…

title: $100,000,000,000,000 Investor Class Starting To Move Into Bitcoin and Crypto, Says Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan
description:
Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan says a cohort of investors holding $100 trillion in wealth is in the early stages of getting Bitcoin (BTC) and crypto exposure. In a weekly memo to investment professionals, the executive of a Bitcoin spot market exchange-traded fund (ETF) issuer says BTC is in the midst of a “raging” bull market. […]
